title: Right-To-Work Update, UW-Madison Staff Diversity
teaser: The University of Wisconsin-Madison strives to attract and retain diverse staff and faculty in order to create a better learning environment. We speak with the Vice Provost for Diversity and Climate about the importance of diversity in the classroom. We also follow the latest news on right-to-work in Wisconsin.
